reviews.review: Ever since I muted all of my teamates and the enemy team. Game suddenly became 1000X better :)

It's a great game to play, but only if you do so with your friends.
The game mechanic is hard to learn, but  worth the effort.
The only thing you should avoid is the community, because it is pure cancer.
